content.text:
# San Diego Film Critics Society Awards 2004

9th SDFCS Awards
December 21, 2004
----
Best Film:
Vera Drake
The 9th San Diego Film Critics Society Awards, given by the San Diego Film Critics Society, honored the best in film for 2004.
Winners
*Best Actor:
**Jim Carrey – Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
*Best Actress:
**Imelda Staunton – Vera Drake
*Best Animated Film:
**The Incredibles
*Best Cinematography (tie):
**Hero (Ying xiong)
**The Phantom of the Opera
*Best Director:
**Clint Eastwood – Million Dollar Baby
*Best Documentary Film:
**Tarnation
*Best Editing:
**Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
*Best Film:
**Vera Drake
*Best Foreign Language Film:
**The Sea Inside (Mar adentro) • Spain/France/Italy
*Best Production Design:
**The Aviator
*Best Score:
**"Million Dollar Baby" – Clint Eastwood
*Best Screenplay – Adapted:
**Sideways – Alexander Payne and Jim Taylor
*Best Screenplay – Original:
**Vera Drake - Mike Leigh
*Best Supporting Actor:
**Phil Davis – Vera Drake
*Best Supporting Actress:
**Natalie Portman – Closer
*Body of Work award:
**Don Cheadle – The Assassination of Richard Nixon, Hotel Rwanda and The United States of Leland
References
External links
* [https://www.imdb.com/event/ev0000580/2004/1/ San Diego Film Critics Society Awards 2004] on IMDb
